price: Пас, вой бар кофирон аз [азоби] рӯзи мавъудашон!
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
